thread.title: Kevin Durant trash talks Oklahoma fans on Twitter after Texas wins
thread.title_full: Kevin Durant trash talks Oklahoma fans on Twitter after Texas wins

author: Larry Brown
title: Kevin Durant trash talks Oklahoma fans on Twitter after Texas wins
text:
Kevin Durant trash talks Oklahoma fans on Twitter after Texas wins Larry Brown Sports 1 day ago Larry Brown © Mark D. Smith-USA TODAY Sports Kevin Durant talked some trash after his Longhorns beat Oklahoma. Kevin Durant couldn't resist the chance to jab Oklahoma fans after Texas upset the Sooners on Saturday, but he quickly deleted the tweet after thinking better of his choice of smack talk.
AdChoices Durant, who attended Texas for one season before leaving for the NBA, was proud of his Longhorns for beating the Sooners 24-17 in the Red River Rivalry. The former NBA MVP sent the following tweet after the game:
© Provided by Larry Brown Sports Though Durant's joy about his alma mater knocking off its big rival is understandable, the reason he deleted is pretty obvious. Durant happens to play for the Oklahoma City Thunder, so it's probably not a good idea to tick off most of your fanbase by kicking them when they're down. Oh, and after seeing that tweet, I think we can all agree with what Draymond Green said about Durant .
